root.name: Disgaea Infinite
root.description: Disgaea Infinite is a PSP visual novel using the setting and characters of the Disgaea series, as well as a new character, a magical pocket watch named Tick Tock. The story involves an attempted assassination of the overlord Laharl, where the player must investigate as one of the series popular prinny characters. The gameplay involves the ability of the player controlled prinny to possess other characters to help him solve the case.

similar_games.game: Akatsuki no Amaneka to Aoi Kyojin: Pashiate Bunmei Kenkyuukai Koubouki
